statements: DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND order_status = 'Pending'
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' AND order_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'shipping' AND is_read = true;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE AND notification_type = 'Shipping'
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE status = 'cancelled');
DELETE FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
